dict.acceptation: 森林；丛林；（森林似的）一丛；一片；
在…造林，使长满树林，使成为森林；

sent.orig: Somewhere near that thin line of shadow, he knew, ran the Old Forest Road.
sent.trans: 他知道，在树林的那排阴影的边儿上，不远的地方，就是古老的Forest路。

sent.orig: Press utility cent, have commercial forest (Zhu Lin) , forest, forest, forest, forest.
sent.trans: 按用途分，有用材林（竹林）、经济林、防护林、生态林、薪炭林。

sent.orig: Habitats in tropical and subtropical mountain forest, coniferous forest, forest edge grass, bamboo forest or savanna.
sent.trans: 栖息于热带、亚热带的山地阔叶林、针阔混交林、林缘草坡、竹林或稀树草原。

sent.orig: The authors make an evaluation of forest quality based on public good forest and commodity forest.
sent.trans: 以公益林和商品林为基础，对森林质量进行了评价。

sent.orig: Promoting the forest landscape construction with forest landscape evaluation, promoting the forest recreation business.
sent.trans: 以森林景观评价促进森林景观建设，促进森林游憩事业的发展。
